title: Border, 18th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of Point d'Alençon edged on one side by small-scale floral sprays with dots of semé de larmes. Fond: brides tortillée.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-145.
